summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Foodambo hyperlocal marketplace app. All core functionalities are working correctly including authentication, store management, product creation, order placement, and location-based discovery.

resolved_issues.issue: Twilio OTP mocking not working properly
resolved_issues.fix: Updated backend to properly detect placeholder credentials and use mocked OTP (123456)
Added {"_id": 0} projection to all database queries to exclude ObjectId fields

integration_issues.issue: Products only appear after location detection is enabled
integration_issues.impact: Users need to grant location permission to see nearby products
integration_issues.note: This is expected behavior for location-based marketplace

passed_tests: Store creation with activation fee message
Product listing creation with all required fields
Product discovery with location-based filtering (2km radius)
My Orders page displays created orders correctly
Backend API endpoints (11/11 passed - 100% success rate)
Integration between frontend and backend APIs
